title: Post-punk revival
summary: Post-punk revival, also known as garage rock revival,[1][2] new wave revival,[3] and new rock revolution[4][2] is a genre of indie rock that developed in the late 1990s and early 2000s, inspired by the original sounds and aesthetics of garage rock of the 1960s and new wave and post-punk of the late 1970s and early 1980s.[3][1]
